member.name: IMFOutputSchema.GetConfigurationData
member.summary: Returns configuration data for the output protection system. The configuration data is used to enable or disable the protection system, and to set the protection levels.
member.param: Receives the configuration data. The meaning of this data depends on the output protection system.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFOutputSchema.GetOriginatorID
member.summary: Retrieves a GUID identifying the input trust authority (ITA) that generated this output schema object.
member.param: Receives a GUID that identifies the originating ITA.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFOutputSchema.GetSchemaType
member.summary: Retrieves the output protection system that is represented by this object. Output protection systems are identified by GUID value.
member.param: Receives the GUID that identifies the output protection system.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFOutputSchema
member.summary: Encapsulates information about an output protection system and its corresponding configuration data.
